mapper.select:
select tml.lm_num,tl.l_name,tml.lm_star,tml.lm_year,tml.lm_term,tl.l_teacher,tm.m_name from tbl_member_lesson tml, tbl_lesson tl, tbl_member tm where tml.m_id=tm.m_id and tl.l_num= tml.l_num
order by tml.lm_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select count(*) from tbl_member_lesson tml, tbl_lesson tl, tbl_member tm where tml.m_id=tm.m_id and tl.l_num= tml.l_num
select l.l_num,l.l_name,l.l_teacher,t.l_num,t.tt_iscomplete from tbl_timetable t , tbl_lesson l where t.m_id=#{m_id} and l.l_num=t.l_num
select l_name,l_teacher,l_num from tbl_lesson where l_num=#{l.num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member_lesson (m_id, l_num, lm_group, lm_year, lm_term, lm_star, lm_hw, lm_attend, lm_comment) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{l_num}, #{lm_group}, #{lm_year}, #{lm_term}, #{lm_star}, #{lm_hw}, #{lm_attend}, #{lm_comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_timetable SET tt_iscomplete='Y' WHERE m_id=#{m_id} and l_num=#{l_num}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member_lesson tml,tbl_lesson tl,tbl_member m where lm_num=#{lm_num} and tml.l_num=tl.l_num and tml.m_id=m.m_id;

select tl.l_name,tl.l_teacher,lm.lm_year,lm.lm_term,lm.lm_star,lm.lm_hw,lm.lm_attend,lm.lm_group,lm.lm_comment,tl.l_num from tbl_lesson tl,tbl_member_lesson lm where tl.l_num=#{l_num} and tl.l_num=lm.l_num
mapper.update: update tbl_member_lesson set lm_year=#{lm_year}, lm_term=#{lm_term}, lm_star=#{lm_star}, lm_hw=#{lm_hw},lm_attend=#{lm_attend},lm_group=#{lm_group},lm_comment=#{lm_comment} where l_num=#{l_num} and m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_warning (lm_num, m_id, w_comment) VALUES(#{lm_num},#{m_id},#{w_comment})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member_lesson tml ,tbl_lesson tl,tbl_member m where lm_num=#{lm_num} and tml.l_num=tl.l_num and tml.m_id=m.m_id;

select lm.lm_num,tl.l_name,lm.lm_star,lm.lm_year,lm.lm_term,tl.l_teacher,tm.m_name, (select count(*) from tbl_warning wt where wt.lm_num = lm.lm_num group by wt.lm_num) as w_count from tbl_member_lesson lm , tbl_lesson tl, tbl_member tm where tl.l_num=lm.l_num and lm.m_id=tm.m_id
order by lm.lm_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
